DROPOUT_RATE.desc: Dropout rate of the Dropout layers

MINIBATCH_SIZE.desc: Number of training cases over which each stochastic gradient descent (SGD) update is computed

NUM_CHANNELS.desc: Number of electrodes recording the EEG signals (channels)

NUM_EVENTS.desc: Number of possible hand motion events to be classified

SAMPLE_LENGTH.desc: Length of a sample that represents an input of the model (3584 is ~7 seconds of signal)

SERIES_TRAINING_INDICES.desc: Indices of the series used for training the model during the training/validatioh phase

SERIES_VALIDATION_INDICES.desc: Indices of the series used for validating the model during the training/validatioh phase
